about_the_game:
Crazy Lemmings is an exciting arcade game where crazy lemmings try to find a way to attain immortality. Along their journey, they will encounter various traps and dangerous monsters, and only by helping each other can they reach their goal.
The main feature of the game is that you control multiple characters at once. Not all of them will be able to survive in this insane adventure; some lemmings will have to be sacrificed to reach the objective.

Features :

  • Black humor!
  • Ability to play as all characters simultaneously
  • Vibrant and colorful locations
  • Realistic physics and well-thought-out details
  • A multitude of deadly traps
  • Simple and understandable gameplay
